title: Huge waves hit Tenerife in Spain's Canary Islands

title: Premiership matches to be shown live on Sky only
description: Scottish Premiership matches will be shown live only on Sky Sports from 2020 after the SPFL struck a new broadcast deal.
content: Scottish Premiership matches will be shown only on Sky Sports from 2020 after the SPFL struck a new broadcast deal. The five-year deal will include 48 games per season, as well as the six Premiership play-off ties. It means BT Sport will no longer show any Sc… [+259 chars]

author: BBC News
title: Brexit: Russian TV says proceedings show UK's 'Russophobia'
description: Channel 1 has revelled in recent UK ministerial resignations and claimed Brexit shows the government's 'Russophobia'.
content: Video Kremlin-controlled Channel 1 in Russia has revelled in recent UK ministerial resignations and claimed Brexit shows the government's anti-Russian agenda.
